com.vividsolutions.jts.edgegraph

Class MarkHalfEdge

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vividsolutions.jts.edgegraph.HalfEdge
      • com.vividsolutions.jts.edgegraph.MarkHalfEdge

  • public class MarkHalfEdge
extends HalfEdge
    A HalfEdge which supports marking edges with a boolean flag. Useful for algorithms which perform graph traversals.
    Author:
    Martin Davis

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MarkHalfEdge(Coordinate orig)
      Creates a new marked edge.
